price: 或者把一个财宝赏赐他，或者他有一座果园，供他食用呢？”不义者说：“你们只顺从一个被蛊惑者。”
arabic: أَوۡ يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٞ يَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aw yul'qā ilayhi kanzun aw takūnu lahu jannatun yakulu min'hā waqāla al-ẓālimūna in tattabiʿūna illā rajulan masḥūran
